divs: Sighting DetailsWent out back to smoke to sit a while since I just woke up to drink my coffee. When I looked up and saw this ball of light just going across the sky. Was going in a perfectly straight line headed SE of Abilene Texas. It was very bright and pretty low. Thought at first maybe a sattellite but oddly enough like on cue their was a sattellite going across the sky in the same direction and this was much much smaller and dimmer than this light that I saw. It didn't change directions at all just went pretty fast but not super fast in a straight line till it got out of sight. Was about twice as bright as im gonna guess thats Jupiter in the sky in July.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around July 8th 2009
